show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: Housing Is A Noose Around Your Neck

title: Housing Is A Noose Around Your Neck
content:
Only the bank gains. Residential real estate does not outpace inflation over time. There are many reasons for this which I discuss in the show.
Americans always expect more from their homes than just a place to live.
They still expect prices to rise by 6% a year.
A powerful piece by Paul Craig Roberts about US: The Gangster State.
About 5 minutes of very incisive and insightful commentary.
Wealth inequality: the whys and wherefores.
The dangers of CLO derivatives are growing.
The new Syria terrorist cell (The United States).
Yet another police scandal involving brutality and death, this time out of Huntsville, Alabama.
The stock market in 1914 at the outbreak of World War 1.
